amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require a portion of the early voting hours of operations to occur outside of normal business hours to ensure maximum accessibility to working individuals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
